events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision at an intersection causing significant damage to the vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under 'Auto Accident' based on the vehicle collision incident reported.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to assist with claim processing and customer support.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer about the next steps.
Customer was requested to submit police report, vehicle damage photos, and driving license copies to proceed with the investigation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents, including the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
Investigation team started reviewing submitted documents and photos to assess the extent of damage and accident circumstances.
Investigation completed with findings confirming liability and estimating repair costs necessary for vehicle restoration.
A settlement proposal has been sent to the customer with compensation details covering the damages as per policy terms.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the processing speed and offer.
Claim has been officially approved based on the investigation outcome and customer acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Compensation payment was issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account as part of the approved claim settlement.
The claim case is now closed following successful payment issuance and customer confirmation of resolution.
All documents and case files have been archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
